name: PHLivePhotoFrame
desc: A container that provides image content for a single frame of a Live Photo in an editing context.

items.name: var image: CIImage
items.desc: The image content of the frame to be processed.

items.name: var renderScale: CGFloat
items.desc: The scale factor of the frame image relative to the Live Photoâ€™s photo content.

items.name: var time: CMTime
items.desc: The time offset, in seconds, of this frame relative to the start of the Live Photo.

items.name: var type: PHLivePhotoFrameType
items.desc: The type of image content in this frame.

items.name: enum PHLivePhotoFrameType
items.desc: Identifiers for the type of frame image to be processed. Used with the type property.
